content.rendered: Pubudu joined Regent in 2016. He joined the Marketing Team based in Sri Lanka and works as a SEO Junior and Web Developer. Prior to that Pubudu had worked in an IT company for nine years in the capacity of a web developer and job analyser. Pubudu has vast experience in PHP, CSS, CMS, Javascript and HTML. Currently Pubudu oversees updates, development and optimization of Regent Group websites.
